mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: The backbone of modded Minecraft.

mod.name: == Eternity ==
mod.description: Please do not select with Era modes.

mod.name: Eternal
mod.description: Vanilla+, this is ALWAYS installed.

mod.name: == Era Modes ==
mod.description: Please do not select with Sandbox modes.

mod.name: == Mode Modifiers ==
mod.description: Please do not select with Era modes.

mod.name: Hardcore Hunger
mod.description: More food, less returns, and starving equates to death.

mod.name: Cheaty
mod.description: Sets most configs to the easiest possible settings possible.

mod.name: Easy
mod.description: Modded Minecraft config settings for the casual player.

mod.name: Hardcore - incomplete
mod.description: Hardcore settings without perma-death, expect harder and changed recipes.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Baubles is a small addon mod and API that is intended to be used by other mods to add additional inventory slots to a character.

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones' mods

mod.name: Commons-Codec
mod.description: Commons Lib

mod.name: Commons-Compress
mod.description: Commons Lib

mod.name: Eureka
mod.description: Knowledge system based on 'learning as you go'

mod.name: ForgeMultipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: libsandstone
mod.description: Sandstone, the foundation for pyramids. Another modding framework.

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Project Red Lib File

mod.name: RedGearCore
mod.description: Core for Brewcraft

mod.name: Java 7 Checker
mod.description: Checks for Java 7. Should hopefully help with the fact that 90% of our bug reports are people trying to use Java 6.

mod.name: Apple Core
mod.description: Adds some useful information about food/hunger to the HUD

mod.name: Another One Bites The Dust
mod.description: Ore 2 Dust Super Bridge

mod.name: Asie Tweaks
mod.description: A tweak for vanilla mechanics, creative tab tweaks, and a graphite replacement for ink sacs.

mod.name: Asie Lib
mod.description: Statues is a Minecraft mod by AUTOMATIC_MAIDEN which adds statues and showcases. Ported primarily due to the fact that MAIDEN's mods are under the GPLv2.

mod.name: ATChecker
mod.description: A server version checker for ATLauncher modpacks

mod.name: Backpacks
mod.description: Provides the player with multiple, colored backpacks, which each has the space of a normal chest.

mod.name: BdLib
mod.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones' mods.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Framework required for all Team CoFH mods.

mod.name: CoFH Lib
mod.description: Library Framework required for all Team CoFH mods.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Dense Ores
mod.description: Randomly makes ores very dense

mod.name: Enchiridion
mod.description: Library mod that enables custom books.

mod.name: Enchiridion 2
mod.description: Custom books in minecraft!

mod.name: Ender Compass
mod.description: Adds a Compass that finds Strongholds

mod.name: Ender Storage
mod.description: Bigger, Better EnderChests and Tanks.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Apples]
mod.description: Cedar salad.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Bamboo]
mod.description: Giant reeds of crafting.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Bees]
mod.description: Adds more bees.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Cellar]
mod.description: BREW YOUR OWN BEER. Need I say more?

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Core]
mod.description: Farmhouse core files.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Fishtrap]
mod.description: Fisherman's friend.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Grapes]
mod.description: Wine tasting?

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Hops]
mod.description: GLORIOUS DWARVEN ALE.

mod.name: GrowthCraft [Rice]
mod.description: JAPANESE BEER.

mod.name: Guide-API
mod.description: Simple mod guide creation.

mod.name: HQM The Journey
mod.description: Quests for Fun

mod.name: InfernalMobs
mod.description: This mod randomly imbues spawning Living Things in the World with Diablo-style random Enchantments, making them much harder and much more rewarding to kill.

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2 API
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: INpure Core
mod.description: Denofloins Core aslo cleans up NEI

mod.name: LunatriusCore
mod.description: A collection of utilities for Lunatrius' mods.

mod.name: Iron Chests
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items.

mod.name: Jabba
mod.description: Just Another Better Barrel Attempt.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Core for Tinkers' Construct

mod.name: MineTweaker
mod.description: Modpack and server tool enabling the addition and removal of recipes

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: Adding more mod support for MineTweaker

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Just enough worldgen to make vanilla worth living.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI Support for Buildcraft 6.1+, Forestry, MFR, and Railcraft.

mod.name: NEM VersionChecker
mod.description: This mod automatically checks against NotEnoughMods listing of mod versions and updates the Mods screen with the appropriate style.

mod.name: Not Enough Items
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: Not Enough Keys
mod.description: A very simple mod created to clean up and organize the keybinds gui, organizing mods into their own category and sub menu.

mod.name: Not Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds NEI integration for world resources like ores and mob drops

mod.name: Nether Ores
mod.description: Introduces mineable yet dangerous ores to the Nether

mod.name: OpenEye
mod.description: Our primary aim is to collect and share vital information to allow us to provide a set of tools to the community to make the experience easier, drama-free and more secure for both users and modders.

mod.name: OpenModsLib
mod.description: This is required for all OpenMods.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: OpenBlocks is a random collection of ideas - ideas the community have suggested, or ideas we thought "Why hasn't anyone done that yet?". There is no theme, it's quite random. It's not even just blocks, as the name suggests!

mod.name: Recurrent Complex
mod.description: Adds structures to worldgen, handles exporting and importing structures, and provides build tools.

mod.name: IvToolkit
mod.description: Framework with various functionalities, but no ingame influence.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod :D

mod.name: sprinkles_for_vanilla
mod.description: This mod aims to add a config for vanilla, currently it is quite new so more configs will be coming but I have made sure to include some of the options I think most people will use first.

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: Core mod for all TE

mod.name: ttCore
mod.description: Core Files for various mods

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Waila (What Am I Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly ingame, without the need of opening an UI.

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: Can I mine this right now?

mod.name: Waila Plugins
mod.description: Miscellaneous WAILA plugins for various mods.

mod.name: == Server Mods ==
mod.description: Server Mods

mod.name: == Client Mods ==
mod.description: Client Mods

mod.name: ArmorStatusHUD
mod.description: Provides a HUD with your equipped armor/item stats.

mod.name: Damage Indicators
mod.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: An IRC Connector that works both on clients and servers independently, with some neat special features.

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: Tick Dynamic
mod.description: Tick Dynamic is a Minecraft Forge CoreMod, which will attempt to maintain a server Ticks Per Second at 20

mod.name: InGame Info XML
mod.description: Display extra information on top of your ingame screen.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: The mod Velo can't live without.

mod.name: Mobius Core
mod.description: Core libs and files for some of ProfMobius' mods

mod.name: Opis
mod.description: Tool to get statistics and read-outs from your server or client, as well as tools to help you find high tick chunks, items, entities, and players... oh and has custom version of MapWriter

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: Adds inventory based item dragging and more!

mod.name: StatusEffectHUD
mod.description: Shows active player effects (potions, etc) without opening your inventory!

mod.name: TC Node Tracker
mod.description: Tracks scanned nodes for Thaumcraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: Thaumcraft integration for NEI, research only appears after you have unlocked it though.

mod.name: TickProfiler
mod.description: A small mod for servers to assist with finding which TileEntities(machines) and Entities are being slow.

mod.name: TiC Tooltips
mod.description: The tooltips you've always wanted for your fancy tools!

mod.name: Voxel Map
mod.description: Radar, Waypoints, Cave Mode... in a neat and clean package.

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU!

mod.name: Ancient Warfare 2
mod.description: Technolgy, Empire, and Industry.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: The world's most convenient storage system.

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: This mods adds various bits and machines to Applied Energistics 2.

mod.name: Extra Cells
mod.description: A massive expansion to Applied Energistics. Store fluids and more.

mod.name: Archimedes' Ships
mod.description: Craft and create your own ship... And sail it across the seven seas!

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: Aroma1997s Dimensional World
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: Artifacts
mod.description: Adds randomly generated magic items to treasure loot generation.

mod.name: Artifice
mod.description: Practical solutions

mod.name: AuraCascade
mod.description: A magic mod focused on emergent complexity and enabling unique designs

mod.name: Balkon's Weapon Mod
mod.description: More Weapons for you to make them hurt.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Biomes O' Plenty Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 16 varietys of wood from Biomes O'Plenty for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power. Special thanks: powercrystals, skyboy, King_Lemming, & Calclavia for example code.

mod.name: Big Trees
mod.description: Generates various large trees, giving Minecraft a more dimensional atmosphere.

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds 87 new, unique biomes!

mod.name: Blood Magic
mod.description: Alphonse, not nose piercing.

mod.name: Sanguimancy
mod.description: Automation for all your Blood Magic needs!

mod.name: BluePower
mod.description: THE POWER OF BLUE!

mod.name: QmuinityLib
mod.description: Library for Qmunity mods

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Create magical flowers and devices utilizing the power of the earth, in the form of Mana.

mod.name: Brewcraft
mod.description: One great leap for potionkind!

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: The new and improved BuildCraft c. 2014!

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: Buildcraft Additions
mod.description: Addon to BuildCraft

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Pipe-based sorting and crafting system

mod.name: Calculator
mod.description: Change the way you craft, manage your health and hunger. Change the way you think about calculators.

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chisel 2
mod.description: Adds a chisel item that lets you carve blocks like cobblestone or sandstone. Adds two new blocks to world generation: marble and limestone, which can be be carved and crafted into many various building materials.

mod.name: More Chisels
mod.description: More chisels for Chisel-2

mod.name: Chisel Facades
mod.description: Compatability mod that bridges BuildCraft facades and Chisel

mod.name: ChocoCraft
mod.description: Happiness distilled into avian form.

mod.name: Compact Machines
mod.description: Shrink (most of) your factory into a single block!

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: Computronics
mod.description: Chat boxes, cassette tapes, and cameras. Everything you would need if this was 1985.

mod.name: CraftHeraldry
mod.description: Decorate your castle, home, base, or cave with banners!!

mod.name: Dark Managerie
mod.description: The basic idea is to add a bunch of mobs to Minecraft that would fit in with vanilla and not be distracting. Each mob has their own quirks, traits and even some special AI methods.

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Decorate until your heart dies.

mod.name: Dimensional Anchors
mod.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: This is a mod that adds a lot of hight tier items such as tools and armor as well as some high tier energy storage and a lot of other random features.

mod.name: Electrical Age
mod.description: Very complex and rewarding power generation and direction system

mod.name: Enchanting Plus
mod.description: Replaces the enchanting system with an optional custom one!

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: We now bring the zoo to you! (Companion to EnderIO)

mod.name: EnhancedPortals 3
mod.description: EnhancedPortals started out as a mod designed to give you a bit more customization for your Nether portals. You could increase the size, shape, or change it's colour. EnhancedPortals 3 takes this even further by leaving behind the focus of being a fully functional, boring, Nether portal.

mod.name: Ex Nihilo
mod.description: Helper mod mainly used for SkyBlock type maps to help with SkyBlock maps

mod.name: Ex Astris
mod.description: Ex Nihilio addon and multi-mod bridge.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of fairly useful things.

mod.name: Falling Meteors
mod.description: Death Approaches from the skies!

mod.name: Flaxbeard's Steam Power Mod
mod.description: Adds various steam powered gadgetry. Comes with shotguns and no warranties

mod.name: Flood Lights
mod.description: Adds flood lights to Minecraft

mod.name: Fluxed Crystals
mod.description: Balanced and RF powered resource farming.

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Bees, Trees, and Automate-ables.

mod.name: Fun World Gen
mod.description: Adds fun worldtypes.

mod.name: Binnie's Mods
mod.description: Extra trees, bees, genetics and... botany?

mod.name: Gendustry
mod.description: Saviour of Forestry.

mod.name: Magic Bees
mod.description: Magic themed bee expansion for Forestry. TC3, EE3, AM compatible!

mod.name: Fossils & Archeology Revival
mod.description: Reserve your own dinosaur creation kit today! We are not liable for damages to person or proporty.

mod.name: Funky Locomotion
mod.description: Frames, motors, enhanced pistons, and more!

mod.name: Galacticraft Core
mod.description: Core for Galacticraft.

mod.name: Galacticraft Planets
mod.description: Plaentary addon for Galacticraft.

mod.name: Micdoodle8 Core
mod.description: Provides core features of Micdoodle8's mods.

mod.name: GardenStuff
mod.description: All the containers you could ever want for planting

mod.name: Gany's End
mod.description: This is one of the three mods in the Gany's Mods collection. Gany's End adds blocks and functionalities related to the end (duh).

mod.name: Gany's Nether
mod.description: This is one of the three mods in the Gany's Mods collection. Gany's Nether adds new blocks and functionalities related to the Nether (duh). Tired of lurking around the Nether looking for glowstone, nether quartz or soul sand? Why not... plant them? Too many rubbish around? melt it down into useful lava that you can pipe out using Buildcraft pipes!

mod.name: Gany's Surface
mod.description: This is one of the three mods in the Gany's Mods collection. Gany's Surface adds blocks and functionalities related to the over world (duh). Poop everywhere! Detect when is raining, make armour out of wood, and have a nice cup of tea in the morning before going mining, just don't put the milk in first!

mod.name: Greg's Lighting
mod.description: Cheap floodlights! \o/

mod.name: Hardcore Ender Expansion
mod.description: Hardcore Ender Expansion offers unique, new content across the End. The dragon became a truly challenging boss with a great reward, but the adventure doesn't end there. The End is no longer just an island. Go investigate unique ores, battle new mobs, travel to new biomes, the death awaits you! ... I mean, adventure. Adventure awaits you.

mod.name: Hopper Ducts
mod.description: Hoppers are good, now they are better.

mod.name: Hydraulicraft
mod.description: Using Hydraulic power for automation and more.

mod.name: K4lib
mod.description: Required Hydraulicraft libraries

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Advanced Machines
mod.description: Modular IC2 Machines.

mod.name: Advanced Repulsion Systems
mod.description: Adds FORCEFIELDS!

mod.name: Advanced Solar Panel
mod.description: This mod really lets you harness the power of the sun, but you better be prepared to pay for it.

mod.name: IC2 Nuclear Control 2
mod.description: Expanding upon Industial Craft's nuclear reactor control systems

mod.name: GraviSuite
mod.description: Gravitation Suite adds many highly advanced tools and items to IC2, it also brings out an armored flight suit!

mod.name: Hunger Overhaul
mod.description: Ever thought hunger should be more integral to surviving?

mod.name: Immibis Core
mod.description: Core mod for Immibis's suite.

mod.name: Immibis' Peripherals
mod.description: This is a mod that adds RFID card, magnetic cards, speakers, LAN cables that work across unloaded chunks and a few other things for computers!

mod.name: Iridium Mod
mod.description: Adds Iridium Ore

mod.name: Lava Monsters
mod.description: This is a small mod that adds a new hostile monster to the game that spawns in lava and spits fireballs at you.

mod.name: Magical Crops
mod.description: Farm your resources!

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Osmium also cures light wounds.

mod.name: Mekanism Generators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: Mekanism Tools
mod.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mod.name: Malisis Doors
mod.description: MalisisCore is framework designed to help develop mods.

mod.name: Malisiscore
mod.description: MalisisCore is framework designed to help develop mods.

mod.name: MineChem
mod.description: Chemical industry in Minecraft!

mod.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mod.description: Automate everything!

mod.name: Metallurgy
mod.description: The Metallurgy.

mod.name: Metallurgy Core
mod.description: The Metallurgy coremod.

mod.name: Old World Gen
mod.description: Brings back old school world gernation types.

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.description: This mod adds programmable, modular and persistent computers to the game.

mod.name: OpenPeripheral Core
mod.description: Converts many blocks into ComputerCraft peripherals!

mod.name: OpenPeripheral Addons
mod.description: This addons pack extends the OpenPeripheral core with Terminal Glasses, PIMs, Peripheral Proxies and more.

mod.name: OpenPeripheral Integration
mod.description: This addons pack extends the OpenPeripheral core with Terminal Glasses, PIMs, Peripheral Proxies and more.

mod.name: Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: Convert between different versions of the same ore using the Forge Ore Dictionary

mod.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mod.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mod.name: Pistronics 2
mod.description: BETA-VERSION: Adds Pistons, Rotators and more.

mod.name: PneumaticCraft
mod.description: A technical mod all about pneumatics!

mod.name: Power Converters
mod.description: Take control of your power

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Limit-less Input/Output pipes, Multi-Block & Free-Form Tanks, Pumps and Canisters

mod.name: Primitive Mobs
mod.description: Add Various mob types

mod.name: Project Blue
mod.depends: Project Red: Base,ProjectRed-Compatibility,Project Red: Integration,Project Red: Lighting,Project Red: Mechanical,Project Red: World
mod.description: Project Red Control Panels Brought to you by Project Blue

mod.name: Project E
mod.description: Equivelant Exchange 2 completly rewritten and made for Minecraft for 1.7.10

mod.name: Project Red: Base
mod.depends: Project Blue,ProjectRed-Compatibility,Project Red: Integration,Project Red: Lighting,Project Red: Mechanical,Project Red: World
mod.description: RedPower2 Clone

mod.name: Project Red: Compatibility

mod.description: RedPower2 Clone

mod.description: RedPower2 Clone

mod.description: RedPower2 Clone

mod.name: QuiverBow
mod.description: A Logical Extension of Ranged weaponry

mod.name: QuiverMob
mod.description: Skeltons are now packing WHAT!?

mod.name: Realistic World Gen
mod.description: Adds a new realistic worldtype

mod.name: Redstone Armory
mod.description: Redstone Armory allows for the creation of even stronger Redstone Flux tools.

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Redstone Arsenal adds several new items used to create powerful tools.

mod.name: Refined Relocation
mod.description: Players of modded Minecraft face many problems: chests are too messy, you need to fit that one pipe onto a block, but it doesn't look nice that way, there are too many pipes everywhere etc. Refined Relocation is here to make your modded Minecraft life easier! Not another new system, but something that works with existing systems and makes it better.

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: RF Tools
mod.description: Bringing more RF based tools and machines to the table

mod.name: Routers Reborn
mod.description: Remake of the Faactorization Routers

mod.name: Simply Jetpacks
mod.description: This is a small mod that adds Redstone Flux-powered jetpacks to the game

mod.name: Soul Shards: Reborn
mod.description: Create your own Creature spwaners. (TheSgtPunishment Version)

mod.name: Statues
mod.description: Create statues out of various blocks

mod.name: Steve's Carts
mod.description: Create extremely versatile carts to automate minecraft, but they come at some extensive costs, and IRL time.

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: ComputerCraft, you're no longer the only programmable automation game in town.

mod.name: Steve's Addons
mod.description: Increases RF compatability and the ability to copy programs to and from managers.

mod.name: Steve's Workshop
mod.description: Improving your Workbench and Furnace.

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: Useful Item frames.

mod.name: Thaumcraft 4
mod.description: Become a Thaumaturgist of legend!

mod.name: Automagy
mod.description: Thaumcraft Automation and Logistics

mod.name: Forbidden Magic
mod.description: Unlock the forbidden thaumcraft magics

mod.name: Magistics
mod.description: Adding some logistics to Thaumcraft!

mod.name: Technomancy
mod.description: Where magic and Redstone Flux combine

mod.name: Thaumic Energistics
mod.description: Essentia Managment via Applied Energistics, for those who want to force technological order upon their chaotic magics.

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT].

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Dynamics
mod.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mod.name: Thermal Smeltery
mod.description: Thermal Smeltery Description

mod.name: The Erebus
mod.description: Dimension of the arthopods, arachnophobes need not apply

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: ExtraTiC
mod.description: Metallurgy compatibility for Tinker's Construct.

mod.name: Iguana Tinker Tweaks
mod.description: Rebalances and adds new features to Tinkers Construct

mod.name: Tinkers' Mechworks
mod.description: Addon for Tinkers' Construct

mod.name: Torcherino
mod.description: Time Torches that won't kill your server.

mod.name: Tweaks--RRino
mod.description: Adds a configurable list to Torcherino

mod.name: Translocator
mod.description: Translocates stuff!

mod.name: Tubes
mod.description: Tubes aims to provide the best item transport and sorting solution using the awesome ForgeMultipart API These tubes work somewhat like the pneumatic tubes in RedPower, but there are many more types of tubes for all sorts of uses.

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: Veinminer
mod.description: When a configured block is harvested a chain reaction is initiated to break connected blocks of the same type. Takes durability and health for each block mined.

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with witchcraft.

mod.name: WR-CBE
mod.description: Redstone Ether with some component items

mod.name: ZTones
mod.description: Adds Various craftable decorative blocks and some useful stuff.

mod.name: Chisel Tones
mod.description: Chisel compatibility for Ztones

mod.name: EiraIRC Client Config
mod.description: Client-specific configs for EiraIRC.

mod.name: EiraIRC Server Config
mod.description: Server-specific configs for EiraIRC.

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.

mod.name: TS2
mod.description: Resonant-Rise for the average player.
